org.promasi.core
Class SdModel

java.lang.Object
  org.promasi.core.SdModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class SdModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

The SdModel consists of many ISdObjects that describe the model. It organizes those objects and provides various methods to handle them. The class follows the javabeans specification.

Author:
eddiefullmetal
See Also:

Field Detail

_keySdObjects

private java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,ISdObject> _keySdObjects
A Hashtable that contains all the ISdObjects of the model. The key of the Hashtable is the ISdObject.getKey() value.

_categories

private java.util.Hashtable<SdObjectType,java.util.List<ISdObject>> _categories
A Hashtable that contains all the ISdObjects of the model Separated by their SdObjectType.

_affectedSdObjects

private java.util.Hashtable<ISdObject,java.util.List<ISdObject>> _affectedSdObjects
A Hashtable that defines which ISdObjects an ISdObject affects. This way with the ISdObject.getDependencies() the system knows which ISdObjects a specific ISdObject needs in order to calculate its value and which ISdObjects a specific ISdObject affects if its value is changed.

_sdObjects

private java.util.List<ISdObject> _sdObjects
All the ISdObjects of the model.

LOGGER

private static final org.apache.log4j.Logger LOGGER
Default logger for this class.

setSdObjects

public void setSdObjects(java.util.List<ISdObject> sdObjects)
                  throws org.apache.commons.lang.NullArgumentException
Registers all the given ISdObjects.

Parameters:
sdObjects - The ISdObjects to register.
Throws:
org.apache.commons.lang.NullArgumentException - In case the sdobjects is null.

initialize

public void initialize()
Initializes the model using the _sdObjects list.

addSdObject

private void addSdObject(ISdObject sdObject)
Registers a single ISdObject to the model.

Parameters:
sdObject - The ISdObject to register.

getSdObject

public ISdObject getSdObject(java.lang.String key)
                      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Gets an ISdObject from the model with a given key.

Parameters:
key - The key of the ISdObject to return.
Returns:
The ISdObject corresponding to the given key or null if an ISdObject with the specified key does not exists.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - In case the key is null or empty

getSdObjectsByType

public java.util.List<ISdObject> getSdObjectsByType(SdObjectType type)
Gets all the ISdObjects that have the specified SdObjectType.

Parameters:
type - The SdObjectType.
Returns:
All the ISdObjects for the specified type or an empty List if no ISdObject with the specified type exists.

getAffectedSdObjects

public java.util.List<ISdObject> getAffectedSdObjects(ISdObject sdObject)
Gets all the ISdObjects that the sdObject affects.

Parameters:
sdObject - The ISdObject to learn which ISdObjects it affects.
Returns:
The ISdObjects that the sdObject affects.

getSize

public int getSize()
Returns:
The number of ISdObjects that this model contains.

getSdObjects

public java.util.List<ISdObject> getSdObjects()
Returns:
All the ISdObjects of the model.
